channel.title: Help on project please
channel.description:
I NEED TO DUE THIS PROJECT BY THE 18TH ANYONE HELP OR INTERESTED IN DOING IT?
-You have been hired by an educational company to create computer program in Java for specific subject areas. The company has offered its employees a bonus incentive for original program development menus. The company requires you to create a page menu containing at least three different subject menu items. Each item must represent different subject area content. Examples: Math – money investment calculations - using Cosine law calculating the angle of a triangle Physics – calculating velocity and acceleration - calculating potential difference - using Ohm’s law Biology - health assessment based on the number of white blood cell count. Arts – evaluating the popularity of an exhibit based on the number of visitors coming to a gallery.
The program is expected to be interactive where the user enters chosen values to be used.

item.title: Help on project please

item.description:
@di.doops wrote:

I NEED TO DUE THIS PROJECT BY THE 18TH
ANYONE HELP OR INTERESTED IN DOING IT?

-You have been hired by an educational company to create computer program in Java for specific subject areas.
The company has offered its employees a bonus incentive for original program development menus.
The company requires you to create a page menu containing at least three different subject menu items.
Each item must represent different subject area content.
Examples:
Math – money investment calculations

  • using Cosine law calculating the angle of a triangle
    Physics – calculating velocity and acceleration
  • calculating potential difference
  • using Ohm’s law
    Biology - health assessment based on the number of white blood cell count.
    Arts – evaluating the popularity of an exhibit based on the number of visitors coming to a gallery.

The program is expected to be interactive where the user enters chosen values to be used.
